Windlord::

"Be carefull"said Windlord "Those teams are pretty agressive and 
dangerous, perhaps you should locate Cosmotaur or chaostaur, 
whichever is his name, and trap him. I think that you should wait 
until Aerotaur and the others come back. And yes I'll go to meet 
angelions as soon as Grounded come, I have some things to tell him 
and I like to be sure that Trinity doesn't leave the base."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Pyrotaur::
>      "Hmm... We'll have to start with those bases then."  He thinks 
to himself again.  "Are you planning on sending someone to the 
Angelions?  They seem impatient."
